outline:
Lang Markus Viehbeck
NLM1-1 11NLM11
1b1-80a3 slob dpon chen po pad+ma ka ra'i thugs rje'i nying khu mdos cho ga sna tshogs blto sgro sa ma ya bsgyur chen dga' ba'i ltad mo
NLM2-1 11NLM21
1b-93b2 dpal gsang dbang 'dus pa'i dbang gi cho ga'i Tik+ka dbang don de nyid rab gsal yang dag gsal sgron me mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan
NLM3-1 11NLM31
1a1-51a5 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa dpal mo'i lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba ga sar dngom
NLM3-2 11NLM32
1b1-27a2 bsangs kyi cho ga dngos grub kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba ngo mtshar rin po che'i phreng ba
NLM3-3 11NLM33
1b1-22b6 lha mchog rnams la dga' bar byed pa'i bsangs mchod bcu gsum mu tig phreng ba/
NLM3-4 11NLM34
1b1-18a3 slob dpon chen po pad+ma ka ra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs baiDUr+ya'i sngon po bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong ma
NLM3-5 11NLM35
1b1-4a2 lugs gnyis kyi rgyud 'debs
NLM4-1 11NLM41
1b1-95a4 byang chub lam gyi rim pa brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong min pa nyams su cho ga skal ldan mgul rgyan nor bu'i 'phreng ba
NLM4-2 11NLM42
1b1-5b3 thub dbang gnas brtan 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i sgo nas yul khyad par can la brtan bzhugs 'bul tshul thub bstan rgyas pa'i nyin byed
NLM4-3 11NLM43
1b1-3b6 tshe lha rnam gsum gyi mngon rtogs
NLM4-4 11NLM43
3b6-7b2 gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung ba'i tshe lha rnam gsum gyi sgo nas gzhan don sgrub pa'i bum pa sgrub tshul gsal byed pa'i lhan thabs tshe yi mchog stsol
NLM4-5 11NLM44
1b1-4b5 dge ldan bka' brgyud rin po che'i phyag chen rtsa ba rgyal ba'i gzhung lam
NLM4-6 11NLM45
1b1-2b3 drag po sbyin sreg gyi 'don pa'i go rim ni
NLM5-1 11NLM51
1b1-30a7 drag po sbyin sreg gyi 'don pa'i go rim ni
NLM5-2 11NLM2
1a6-2a8 rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi gtor bzlog gi lag len gsal ba'i me long
NLM5-3 11NLM53
1b1-11a6 khro bo rgyal po rta mchog rol ba gsang sgrub kyi gtor bzlog gi lag len gsal bying rig pa 'dzin pa'i dgongs rgyan
NLM5-4 11NLM54
1b1-6a2 khro bo rme brtsegs la brten nas grin glud rdzongs chos 'khyer bde ba zhig
NLM5-5 11NLM55
1b1-7a3 rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas tshe 'gugs byed tshul 'khyer bde
NLM5-6 11NLM56
1b1-1b1-28b3 'byung bzhi gtor ma'i gdams pa nymas su len tshul gsal bar bkod pa nam mkha'i rnga chen
NLM5-7 11NLM57
1b1-10a6 rgyal po'i gsol mchod dregs pa'i re ba skong byed
NLM5-8 11NLM58
1b1-9b3 btsan gyi gsol mchod 'phrul gyi mchod sbyin
NLM5-9 11NLM59
1b1-9a3 yid dam kha' 'gro chos srung spyi la sbyar rung gi bzlog pa'i cho ga mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i mtshan
NLM5-10 11NLM510
1b1-6a4 ltung gshags kyi sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul
NLM5-11 11NLM511
1b1-4a5 rlung rta'i lha la bsangs mchod 'bul tshul
NLM5-12 11NLM512
1b1-10a1 bse rag 'byung po'i gnod pa zhu bar byed pa'i thabs zab mo
NLM5-13 11NLM513
1b1-9b1 glud gtor gto bcos ci rigs kyi thog mthar sbyor rgyu'i yan lag 'ga' zhig
NLM5-14 11NLM514
1b1-7a3 sa bdag chab gtor gtong tshul rkyen ngan kun sel
NLM5-15 11NLM515
1b1-16a2 lan chags gtor ma gtong tshul sungs 'bru'i lhun po
NLM5-16 11NLM516
1b1-4b2 grub chen lce sgom pa'i 'chi blu'i gtor ma
NLM5-17 11NLM517
1b1-5b1 dpal ldan lha mo'i mdos glud
NLM5-18 11NLM518
1b1-3a2 lo ma gyon ma rigs gsum gyi bsgom bzlas rgyun 'khyer ma
NLM5-19 11NLM519
1b1-2b3 ba ri lugs khro bo rme brtsegs dud kha'i nsgom bzlas 'khyer bde
NLM5-20 11NLM520
1b1-5b4 me mchod kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bkra shis dpal 'bar
NLM5-21 11NLM521
1b1-4b3 kha 'bar ma dkar mo'i sgo nas 'chi blu bya tshul
NLM5-22 11NLM522
1b1-26a6 rje btsun seng ge sgra la brten pa'i klu dang sa bdag gi gdon 'grol gyi cho ga nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi
NLM5-23 11NLM523
1b1-11b5 rlung rta bskyed pa'i mdos chog 'dod don lhun grub
NLM5-24 11NLM524
1b1-3a2 rgyal gsol mdor sdus dregs pa mnyes byed
NLM5-25 11NLM525
1b1-3a4 dag snang 'khurgs skong 'khyer bde ba
NLM5-26 11NLM526
1b1-13a1 rje btsun sgrol ma la maN+Dala bzhi'i mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub
NLM5-27 11NLM527
1b1-11a5 rje btsun ma ku ru ku l+le'i sgrub thabs ud+pala phreng ba
NLM5-28 11NLM528
1b1-3b4 rgyal dbang skal bzang rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa thugs rje chen po bcu gcig gzhal dpal mo lugs kyi dbang gi bla rgyud gsol 'debs la kha bskang sbyar tshul dang bcas pa
NLM6-1 11NLM61
1b1-5b2 dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la brten pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bde ba chen po'i rgya mtsho
NLM6-2 11NLM62
1b1-8b4 rje btsun sgrol ma ljang khu'i sbyin sreg
NLM6-3 11NLM63
1b1-1b8 oM badz+ra a mr-i tas bsangs
NLM6-4 11NLM64
1b1-4a2 khri mnga' mdud phur bu myur byon 'dod na
NLM6-5 11NLM65
1b1-5b5 rje btsun ma 'phags ma gdugs dkar gyi bskang bshags
zhes pa 'di ni rje btsun dam pa rdo rje 'chang chen po tA ra na tha'i zhus dag mdzad pa byin rlabs che zhing bar chad thams cad bzlogs pa'o/_yang gcig lugs shAkya'i dge slong btsun pa blo bzang chos kyis rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba dge'o
NLM6-6 11NLM66
1b1-4b3 phyag na rdo rje gshegs gtor 'bul tshul
NLM6-7 11NLM67
1b1-7b5 dpal ldan lha mo rem te'i mdos glud chog phan 'di 'byung gnas
dpal ldan dmag zor ma bsten pa'i mdos glud phan bde kun stsol zhes bya ba 'di yang shri ke thu chos rje blo bzang zhi bas dam pa rnams kyi gsung rgyun phyag len ltar bgyis pas dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig
NLM6-8 11NLM68
1b1-2b7 rje btsun 'jam dbyangs gyis sgrub thabs
NLM6-9 11NLM69
1b1-5b2 kong rtse gsol mchod 'dod yon sprin phung
NLM6-10 11NLM610
1b1-2b7 sher snying ga'i bzlog pa bgyur
'di ni thabs la er te ni mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal pos sbyar ba'o
NLM6-11 11NLM611
1b1-4ba2 rgya nag skag bzlog gyis bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-12 11NLM612
1b1-4b2 ltas ngan brgyad bcu rtsa gcig bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-13 11NLM613
1b1-4a5 pad+ma 'byung gnas gzungs rak+Sha lnga'i bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-14 11NLM614
1b1-3b2 mgon po sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul
NLM6-15 11NLM615
1b1-4b1 mgon po phyag drug la brten 'gal rkyen phyir bzlog mdos glud
NLM6-16 11NLM616
1b1-6a3 bla ma yi dam dpal phyag na rdo rje bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-17 11NLM617
1b1-4b2 dam can chos rgyal gyi sgo nas srog glud
NLM6-18 11NLM618
1b1-3a7 byis pa'i srog glud
NLM6-19 11NLM619
1b1-2a6 sme ba gnyis nag gi bcos thabs
NLM6-20 11NLM620
1b1-2b3 gang phyugs nu ma 'o ma nyes byung bcos thabs
NLM6-21 11NLM621
1b1-2b3 bskangs gso
NLM6-22 11NLM622
1b1-4b4 keg bsgyur
NLM6-23 11NLM623
1b1-8b5 rgyal mdos
NLM6-24 11NLM624
1b1-3b5 phyag rdor gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs
NLM6-25 11NLM625
1b1-7a6 dgra lha rgyal po mched dgu'i la gshegs pa gtor 'bul tshul
NLM6-26 11NLM626
1a1-1b3 gnod sbyin dgra lha'i rgyal po'i mngon rtogs
NLM6-27 11NLM627
1b1-9a7 dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun
NLM6-28 11NLM628
1b1-7a5 khro bo kha mchu nag po bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-29 11NLM629
1b1-9b5 khro bo kha mchu nag po bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-30 11NLM630
1b1-5a1 rgya nag skag bzlog gyis bzlog bsgyur
NLM6-31 11NLM631
1b1-4a5 mgon po sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul
NLM6-32 11NLM632
1b1-7a5 byis pa'i gdon chen bco lnga mdos kyi cho ga
NLM6-33 11NLM633
1b1-1b6 yul lha bzhi bdag 'khor bcas spyan drangs
NLM6-34 11NLM634
1b1-5b1 chos skyong lcam sring gi mdos glud
NLM6-35 11NLM635
1b1-5a1 dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i bzlog bsgyur rkyen ngan sel byed
NLM6-36 11NLM636
1b1-4b5 myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i bzlog bsgyur byed tshul
NLM6-37 11NLM637
1b1-20b5 ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can la mchod gtor bskang rdzas sogs 'bul ba'i tshul mdor bsdus pa
NLM6-38 11NLM638
1b1-3a3 glud rdzongs
NLM6-39 11NLM639
1b1-5a3 sa bdag chab gtor
NLM6-40 11NLM640
1b1-3b2 chos skyong lcam sring gi tshogs 'khor dar sbyin sreg dang sangs rgyas bcu phrag gi dam bcas
NLM6-41 11NLM641
1b1-3b5 chos skyong lcam sring gyi mngon rtogs bskangs gshags bstod pa bskul sogs
NLM6-42 11NLM642
1b1-14a5 rje btsun bla ma ngag dbang bstan pa dpal bzang po'i rnam thar gsol 'debs dad pa'i sgo 'byed
NLM6-43 11NLM643
1a1-4b5 gsol 'debs
NLM6-44 11NLM644
1a1-2a5 bla ma dang byams mgon la gsol ba 'debs pa
NLM6-45 11NLM645
1b1-6b3 tshe dpal 'dab stong rgyas byed nam mkha'i nor bu
NLM6-46 11NLM646
1b1-4b2 phyag na rdo rje sgrub par 'dod pa
NLM6-47 11NLM647
1b1-15a6 bla ma la brten pa'i sdig ltung sbyong thabs snying gi mun sel
NLM6-48 11NLM648
1b1-9a6 gter bum sgrub tshul
NLM6-49 11NLM649
1b1-2b5 'jam dpal nag po'i bsgom bzlas
NLM7-1 11NLM71
1b1-19a3 dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lo dril gnyis kyi bsnyen pa byed tshul gsal bar bshad pa mkha' 'gro'i gsang mdzod bdud rtsi'i bum bzang
NLM7-2 11NLM72
1b1-2b3 bla ma dang dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lha tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo
NLM7-3 11NLM73
1b1-146a3 bla ma mchod pa'i nyams khrid zab mo stsal skabs kyi zin bris zhal shes man ngag gis brgyan pa
NLM8-1 11NLM81
1b1-87a6 dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom par brjod pa rnal 'byor ma bla na med pa rgyud thams cad kyi bla ma bde mchog bsdus pa shrI he ru ka rA dza tsa kra saM pa ra b+hi d+ha na yo gi rud ta ra sarba tan trod ta ra saM ba ra daM gra ha na ma
NLM9-1 11NLM91
1b1-8a2 rje btsun dam pa rang byung ye shes rdo rje la gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa byin rlabs sgo 'byed
NLM9-2 11NLM92
1b1-8a6 ma Ni bum sgrub gyi cho ga dngos grub gter mdzod
